description: Tools for managing product restocking and procurement

tools.name: get_current_restock_schedule
tools.description: Retrieves the current restock schedule for specific items or all inventory, including expected delivery dates and quantities

item_id.description: Specific item identifier to check restock schedule for

category.description: Product category to filter restock schedule

tools.name: check_expedited_shipping_options
tools.description: Checks available expedited shipping and rush order options from suppliers, including additional costs and timeline improvements

item_id.description: Item identifier to check expedited options for

quantity_needed.description: Quantity of items needed for expedited delivery

max_additional_cost.description: Maximum additional cost willing to pay for expedited delivery

tools.name: find_alternative_suppliers
tools.description: Searches for alternative suppliers who can provide faster delivery times for out-of-stock or low-stock items

item_id.description: Item identifier to find alternative suppliers for

max_delivery_days.description: Maximum acceptable delivery time in days

include_new_suppliers.description: Whether to include suppliers not previously used

tools.name: adjust_reorder_parameters
tools.description: Modifies reorder points, quantities, and frequencies to prevent future stockouts and enable faster restocking

item_id.description: Item identifier to adjust reorder parameters for

new_reorder_point.description: New minimum stock level that triggers reorder

new_reorder_quantity.description: New quantity to order when reorder point is reached
